title: Frozen II
discription: Why was Elsa born with magical powers? Together with Anna, Kristoff, Olaf, and Sven, she sets out on dangerous but remarkable journey to find the answer.

title: Cars 2
discription: Racing superstar Lighting McQueen zooms back into action, with his best friend Master, to take on the globes fastest and finest cars.

title: Onward
discription: Set in a suburban fantasy world, Onward introduces two teenage brothers who embark on an extraordinary quest to discover if there is still a little magic left out there.

title: Rio 2
discription: After being hurted from Rio de Janeiro Blu, his wife Jewel , and three kid's go back to the jungles of Amazon. Will the city bird family fit into the wild?

title: Wreck-It Ralph
discription: Ralph , an arcade game villain, sets of on a journey through every generation of video games to prove he's got what it takes to be a hero.

title: Luca
discription: The movie is coming-of-age story about one young boy experiencing an unforgettable summer filled with gelato, pasta and endless scooter rides.

title: Eena Meena Deeka
discription: Eena Meena Deeka is a story of constant chase between cunning hungry fox and three chicks - Eena, Meena and Deeka

title: Marvel Comics The Incredible Hulk
discription: A nuclear scientist is afflicted with the tendency to change into a powerful green monster under stress.

title: Marvel's Ultimate Spider-Man
discription: Spider-man's greatest enemies are back and he needs a new team: a team put together by Spider-man himself including Agent Venom, Iron Spider and Scarlet Spider.
